value.title: How to create Sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting in Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: Patrick walks finishes his look at Paginated Reports in Power BI. He shows you how to create sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting within the Paginated Report using Report Builder.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports.
